name: Elle
description:
In Elle, you play the life of a woman name Elizabeth. In her last moments, Elizabeth wakes up and begins to experience her life backwards. She must find her way through her life-long home, fighting mice and mean old cats, finding lost memories, and trying to regain her childhood.

This game was developed during PIGSquad's second slow jam.

Our team:
Andy - Programming
Donald - Story, Level Design
Wes - Music, Level Design, Story, Sound Design
Kora - Art, Animation
Helly - Art
Ken - Art
